title: Baladi Mediterranean Cafe
typeOfFood: Organic, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Established 2008, this casual cafe offers Mediterranean cuisine with vegetarian and vegan suitable dishes like spicy jalapeno hummus, muhammarah (walnut and pistachio dip with pomegranate molasses and olive oil), chopped parsley with organic cracked wheat salad topped with and fresh tomatoes, cucumber and almond slivers.
